The natural warmth and beauty of bamboo will showcase your banner display stand in upscale style. It grows back amazingly fast and it's a grass. So you can feel good about not destroying any trees.

An X-cellent choice for flexibility and economy

Bamboo X banner stands are designed to support larger banners. Simply fasten each corner of the banner to the rods that form the stand and your message will be anchored in place. Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

One side printable option with its mirror image reflecting on the other side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided, flush cut printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides.

Hardware

Pole

Pole is a supportive hardware that is used to display flags. It can be used multiple times with different flag designs. The aluminum pole can withstand harsh weather conditions.

Accessories

Base Options

Spike Base

The design of the base adds stability to resist environmental elements. This attachment to the flag can be easily pinned to the ground due to its pointed structure.

Cross Base

As the name suggests, the base is designed as a cross that is suitable for indoor and outdoor usage. Its elegant design makes it a popular choice for various events.

Cross Base with Water Bag

An additional water bag is added to the cross base to add sturdiness; a necessity when the banner needs to be used outdoors particularly during the windy season.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

Buy Premium Quality & Attractive Blade Flags to Promote Your Business or Brand

To promote a business or brand to potential customers, it's necessary to connect to the audience visually. Our custom printed blade flags are effective in advertising your business, providing ideal brand promotion that takes up minimal space in your store and attracts new customers to your brand.

Our roadside flags construction is from synthetic flag cloth and carbon composite fiberglass hardware. Both materials produce sturdy and weather-resistant outdoor flags, allowing you to display your message effectively and for a long time until you remove them.

The flags come with a 90 GSM knitted polyester fabric that resists easy wrinkling for long-term use outdoors. They preserve their appearance and help convey the message needed to your audience.

We use 1440 DPI, full color, dye sublimation printing technique to print our blade flags. It produces high-resolution and vibrant graphics on your flags. The full-color printing allows superior print quality which is visible even from afar. This makes your flags attractive and entices the audience to read your message.

You can print the flags on a single-side or double-side. Single-sided flags will exhibit the image on the back side as a mirrored image with 50-60% visibility. Double-sided flags can have 2 separate images or the same image as per your choice. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides. Decide on single or double-sided printing to highlight brands to the masses effectively.

Our marketing flag's tall, thin form has a distinctive design that attracts visitors. Its installation uses minimal space, so you can keep a clutter-free area where the flag stands out.

Whether you want a small sized flag, a medium sized flag, or a large one, our multiple size options will help you in easy selection of flags. The available options are 1.55' x 5.5', 2' x 7.58', 2' x 9.58', 2.25' x 11.5', 2.5' x 15.42'.

We can personalize the roadside blade flag printing in a variety of ways to fit the requirements at your workplaces. Upload a custom design or use our design tool to make your personalized flags. Other options include size, a reverse side, and a spike or cross base. Flags are also available without the cloth or the base.

The custom blade flags are lightweight and easy to transport and keep. Whether you use cross or spike bases, the personalized blade flags are easy to move. Because of their high adaptability, the flags are readily available for reuse in the future for a high return on investment.

The superior quality blade flags are easy to maintain and handle using liquid laundry detergent. You can hand wash the flag or can simply wash it by setting the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.

Besides these features, we also offer ‘Priority’ shipping to get your product on your selected date. All you need to do is choose the date on which you want your product and select ‘Priority’ shipping during checkout. Shop for durable blade flags now!

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Hanging Options

Metal Grommets

Made from heavy duty brass, these rustproof grommets are set in place onto a punched hole creating a secure and strong edge. Use them in conjunction with a rope, ties, bungee cords, or other tie-down options. You can choose the position of grommets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Pole Pockets

A pole pocket is a pole sleeve where a pole or a rod can slide into. It is created by folding and sealing approximately 3" extra material outside the actual flag size towards the back of the flag. You can choose the position of pole pockets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Product AB Desc:
Product Specification
  • Graphic Material: Knitted Polyester Fabric
  • Graphic Weight: 90 GSM
  • Printing: 1440 DPI, Full Color, Dye Sublimation Printing
  • Single Sided Printing: Single sided flags will show the image on the back side as a mirrored image with 50-60% visibility.
  • Double Sided Printing: Double sided flags can have 2 separate images or the same image. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides
  • Finishing: Additional 3" white fabric on selected side for pole pockets. Additional 1" white fabric on selected side for grommets.

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Hanging Options

Metal Grommets

Made from heavy-duty brass, these rustproof grommets are set in place onto a punched hole creating a secure and strong edge. Use them in conjunction with rope, ties, bungee cords, or other tie-down options. You can choose the position of grommets at the top of the flag as per your requirements.

Pole Pockets

A pole pocket is a pole sleeve where a pole or a rod can slide into. It is created by folding and sealing approximately 3" extra material outside the actual flag size towards the back of the flag. You can choose the position of pole pockets at the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

NOTE:

We offer only graphic for the flag. No hardware comes with this product

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Accessories

Base Options

Spike Base

The design of the base adds stability to resist environmental elements. This attachment to the flag can be easily pinned to the ground due to its pointed structure.

Cross Base

As the name suggests, the base is designed as a cross that is suitable for indoor and outdoor usage. Its elegant design makes it a popular choice for various events.

Square Base

A square base provides flags with greater stability. It helps in hassle-free installation and is best suitable for harsh weather conditions.

Cross Base with Water Bag Option

An additional water bag is added to the cross base to add sturdiness; a necessity when the banner needs to be used outdoors particularly during the windy season.

Hardware

Pole

Pole is a supportive hardware that is used to display flags. It can be used multiple times with different flag designs. The carbon composite fiber glass pole can withstand harsh weather conditions.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

Product Specification:
Big Sky Counter is part of the Resort Extrusion family-aluminum frames for Silicone-Edge Graphics (SEG). Custom-made on the premises, Big Sky Counter comes in varied sizes. Big Sky Counter accepts four individual custom fabric graphics, excluding top and bottom. Insert graphics after frame is constructed by tilting it on its side. Transversely, push corners of graphic into the frame's recessed groove. Then, starting midway on the frame going toward the corners, continue pushing in the straight edges of the graphic. Repeat three times. Place the frosted acrylic countertop last.

Includes:

  • SEG Fabric Graphics for 2 ft, 4 ft, 6 ft. sides
  • Vertical Extrusion pieces and connectors
  • Horizontal Extrusion pieces and connectors

Big Sky Counter accepts four individual custom fabric graphics, excluding top and bottom. Insert graphics after frame is constructed by tilting it on its side. Transversely, push corners of graphic into the frame's recessed groove. Then, starting midway on the frame going toward the corners, continue pushing in the straight edges of the graphic. Repeat three times. Place the frosted acrylic countertop last.

Includes:

  • SEG Fabric Graphics for 2 ft, 4 ft, 6 ft. sides
  • Vertical Extrusion pieces and connectors
  • Horizontal Extrusion pieces and connectors
  • Acrylic Countertops
  • Torx Key

Warranty:

1 year on frame

1 year on graphic

Product Overview

Transform Your Space with Our Classic Wooden Chalkboard

The chalkboard sign brings a timeless charm to any setting, combining functionality with classic design. Each board features a premium wooden frame that adds warmth and character to your space. The black chalkboard surface creates the perfect canvas for your messages, whether you're running a business or organizing your home. This versatile piece maintains its appearance in both indoor and outdoor environments.

Quality Materials Meet Professional Craftsmanship in Every Board

The frame comes fully assembled, ready to use right out of the box. Its sturdy wood construction makes it both durable and manageable. The two-panel design ensures a smooth, consistent writing surface that maintains its appearance over time.

Essential Accessories to Enhance Your Chalkboard Experience

Our chalkboards for signs come ready for your preferred writing tools. We recommend using high-quality chalk or chalk markers to achieve the best results. The smooth black surface provides excellent contrast for both traditional chalk and modern chalk ink, allowing for clear, visible messaging that stands out.

Practical Applications and Simple Maintenance Instructions

Perfect for chalkboard signs for businesses like restaurants, cafes, and retail stores, this A frame chalkboard sign requires minimal maintenance. Simply wipe clean with a damp cloth and avoid harsh chemicals. The lightweight design includes convenient side handles for easy relocation. Trade shows are enticing opportunities for marketing your business to customers as well as other vendors. Whether you are a new business that wants to promote itself or an existing business that is looking to promote a new product, trade shows are a must-attend event for all. This also makes a trade show canopy kit a must-have item for all businesses.

Our trade show display kit comprises of three components that make it a complete set for setting up a stall at any event. It contains a custom canopy tent 10x10 a blade flag, and a premium white table cloth. These can be customized based on your needs.

All three items are essential for setting up stalls at trade shows. With the trade show canopy kit, all your trade show needs are met in a single kit. The kit even comes with a travel bag with wheels to carry all these items. The kit is lightweight, making it easy to move around.

The premium trade show display kit is made of durable materials. Whether it is the blade flags, the canopy tent, or the table cloth, they are sure to last for years to come. The premium trade show canopy kit uses only high-quality materials such as aluminum for the frame of the canopy and blade flag, and superior fabric for the flag, table cloth, and tent. All items feature full-color, high-quality graphics.

Our custom tent with logo that are versatile, professional, and draws attention effortlessly. The frame is made from durable aluminum, designed for custom pop up tents.

All the components of the trade show display kit can be disassembled into smaller pieces. The pieces fit inside the travel bag that is a part of the kit. Since the metal used for the canopy and flag frame is aluminum, the whole kit is very lightweight.

Durable Trade Show Display Kit

This trade show display kit is made to last you a long time. All three components are made of durable materials that will withstand all signs of wear and tear. This ensures that you get the best value for the money you spend on using these to market your business.

  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate

  • Graphic Material: Knitted Polyester Fabric
  • Graphic Weight: 90 GSM

  • Single Sided Printing: Single sided flags will show the image on the back side as a mirrored image with 50-60% visibility.

  • Lowest Pole Diameter: 23 mm

  • Finishing: Black pole pocket at left side.

  • Base Diameter:13.5 mm
  • Holder Diameter:16.5mm

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The design will be printed on one side with mirror visibility of 50-60% displayed on the backside of the flag.

Double Sided Printing

Design will be printed on both sides with the same image or 2 separate images with a liner sewn in between.

Accessories

Base Options

Spike Base

The design of the base adds stability to resist environmental elements. This attachment to the flag can be easily pinned to the ground due to its pointed structure.

Cross Base

As the name suggests, the base is designed as a cross that is suitable for indoor and outdoor usage. Its elegant design makes it a popular choice for various events.

Cross Base with Water Bag

An additional water bag is added to the cross base to add sturdiness; a necessity when the banner needs to be used outdoors, particularly during the windy season.

Hardware

Pole

Pole is a supportive hardware that is used to display flags. It can be used multiple times with different flag designs. The carbon composite fiber glass pole can withstand harsh weather conditions.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

Buy Concave Flags for Brand Awareness & Customer Retention

Thinking of some eye-catching display at trade shows/ sporting events/ exhibitions/ concerts or festivals? Ideal for your brand promotions at these events, our hard-to-miss Concave Flags from BannerBuzz are a perfect way to catch the attention of passersby, bring in customers, and to increase sales.

Out of all the marketing tools available, custom concave flags are perhaps the easiest to put up and put down at a short notice. No more running around looking for a ladder and cable ties to set up these flags. With a concave flag, all you need is to set up the stands and add the flag, easy. This leaves you more time to focus on the important part, attracting your customers.

Available in sizes that range from 6 ft to 14 ft, our concave flags are easy to set up. Created out of flag fabric material, the weight of the flags is not more than 90 GSM. This makes them not just lightweight but also UV-and-fade resistant.

Adding to the strength of the concave flag is the hardware material made of carbon composite fiberglass that is known for its toughness and durability. Helping them stay up strong are the two base options on offer. While the cross base is ideal for use on hard surface ground, the spike base is perfect for use outdoors. In the case of the latter, simply attach the flag to the base and pin it into the ground. The finishing includes a black pole pocket on the left side.

If opting only for the hardware, keep in mind that it includes poles and base only. The graphics-only option does not include poles and base, while the graphics-with-hardware one includes poles and base too.

The concave flags can be easily hand-washed with a mild liquid detergent - the kind used for delicate items. To wash them in the machine, just set it on the gentle cycle with warm water and add a mild liquid laundry detergent to it. However, we must add that frequent use of the washing machine to clean the flag may harm the knitting of its fabric.

The personalized concave flags come with two printing options. The single-sided printed flags show the image on the reverse side as a mirrored image with 50-60% visibility. The double-sided concave flags printing can have two separate images or the same image used on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides. To personalize your flags, choose any of the templates created by our team of designers. You can also create a design of your own complete with taglines, themes, and colors that reflect what your brand is all about.

For those looking to order in bulk, special discounts are on offer. Shop online for your concave flags and get your special discount. Buy more to grab bigger discounts and save on your company budget. If looking for faster delivery, just choose ‘priority’ shipping before you check out.

Our collection of templates can assist you in creating your personalized clip flags-teardrop. Customize colors, logos, and graphics and text to make a one-of-a-kind sign that suits your marketing objectives. You can use your own pre-made designs with the upload artwork feature.

Our personalized teardrop clip flags are made from high-quality materials and are a long-lasting solution for a variety of applications. They are not easily damaged, and the ink lasts for an extended period of time. For clip flags-teardrop printing, we employ sublimation technique. A design is first printed onto unique paper. When heated, the inks are converted to gases, which combine with the cloth to imprint the fabric permanently. Since the ink is entrenched in the fabric or substrate rather than merely sitting on top like a typical print, the effects are long-lasting and less prone to fading. The procedure is very similar to getting a tattoo. The heat causes the fabric's pores to open, and as pressure is applied, the ink cools and solidifies once more.

Sublimation printing embeds the ink in the fabric's fibers, making the flags resistant to fading. The flags draw people to your establishment with the high-resolution imagery and details. The final graphics are eye-catching, vibrant and glossy.

With our custom clip flags, we include all of the necessary hardware. They are available with a pole and a clip attached to them. The pole is pivoted to allow the flag to be rotated easily. It helps in reducing the wear and tear on the flag.

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Hanging Options

Pole Pocket

A pole pocket is a pole sleeve where a pole or a rod can slide into. It is created by folding and sealing approximately 3" extra material outside the actual flag size towards the back of the flag. You can choose the position of pole pockets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Metal Grommets

Made from heavy duty brass, these rustproof grommets are set in place onto a punched hole creating a secure and strong edge. Use them in conjunction with a rope, ties, bungee cords, or other tie-down options. You can choose the position of grommets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

Product AB Desc:
Product Specification
  • Graphic Material: Knitted Polyester Fabric
  • Graphic Weight: 90 GSM
  • Printing: 1440 DPI, Full Color, Dye Sublimation Printing
  • Single Sided Printing: Single sided flags will show the image on the back side as a mirrored image with 50-60% visibility.

  • Finish size may have +/-1"" variation.

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Hanging Options

Pole Pocket

A pole pocket is a pole sleeve where a pole or a rod can slide into. It is created by folding and sealing approximately 3" extra material outside the actual flag size towards the back of the flag. You can choose the position of pole pockets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Metal Grommets

Made from heavy duty brass, these rustproof grommets are set in place onto a punched hole creating a secure and strong edge. Use them in conjunction with a rope, ties, bungee cords, or other tie-down options. You can choose the position of grommets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

NOTE:

Product Specification:
Graphic Material Polyester Fabric
Graphic Weight 6.8 oz
Hardware Material Aluminum
Pole Diameter Top: 1.18"
Bottom: 1.49"
Pole Thickness 0.05"

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

If you want to showcase two different images on both sides or the same images, our double-sided printing is a perfect option. Description:
Versatile Retractable Banner Stand with Unique Features

Designed to garner attention towards your brand at a trade show or event, our silverstep 36” retractable banner stands are made to endure tough weather conditions. Available in four predefined sizes, our banner stands come with a template size of 36"W x (69" to 92") H. With a 6” bleed on the bottom, the height can be easily adjusted by cutting the bungee cord.

Available in different weights corresponding to the diverse sizes, our banner stands come with a retractable base having end caps. Providing a clean edge-to-edge display, our retractable banner stand can be ordered with a black or silver base as required.

Uniquely designed to advertise banner graphics at an event, our durable stand can be bought with silver light (50W) or black light (50W). Packed with a silverstep travel bag of 41" x 12" x 4" measurements, our banner stands have a graphic turnaround of 2-4 days after proofs are approved.

Easy to order with just a few clicks, our retractable banner stands come with free super saver shipping for orders above $99. Shipped around the globe, you can opt for 'Priority' shipping at checkout for fast delivery.

Easy to Assemble Silverstep Retractable Banner Stands

A perfect blend of durability and strength, our retractable banner stands come with a quick and easy setup. The banner can be easily attached using the clamp bar or velcro. While the loop side must be placed on the bottom of the graphic banner, the hook side should go on the leader of the stand.

Created from high-quality aluminum, the banner stand is equipped with a telescopic pole and a support pole. Sturdy and trendy, our banner stand is suitable for indoor as well outdoor events.

Buy Stylish Banner Stands at Discounted Rates

Crafted with precision to meet your marketing objectives, our stylish banner stands are available with a heavy discount on bulk orders. You are entitled to a special discounted price when the stands are purchased in large quantities. Therefore, it is recommended to buy as many stands as possible at once to increase your savings. Buy now!

• Retractable banner stands made from aluminum.
  • Available in four predefined sizes with adjustable height.
  • Comes with a telescopic and support pole.
  • Bulk quantity discount applicable.

Product AB Desc:
Product Specification
  • Graphic Material: Knitted Polyester Fabric
  • Graphic Weight: 90 GSM
  • Printing: 1440 DPI, full color, Dye sublimation printing
  • Single-Sided Printing: Single-sided flags will show the image on the back side as a mirrored image with 50-60% visibility.
  • Double-Sided Printing: Double-sided flags can have 2 separate images or the same image. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.
  • Finishing: Additional 3" white fabric on selected side for pole pockets. Additional 1" white fabric on selected side for grommets.

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Hanging Options

Metal Grommets

Made from heavy duty brass, these rustproof grommets are set in place onto a punched hole creating a secure and strong edge. Use them in conjunction with a rope, ties, bungee cords, or other tie-down options. The grommets will be available at the left side of the flag for convenient placement.

Pole Pockets

A pole pocket is a pole sleeve where a pole or a rod can slide into. It is created by folding and sealing approximately 3" extra material outside the actual flag size towards the back of the flag. The pole pockets will be available at the left side of the flag for convenient placement.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

NOTE:

We offer only graphic for the flag. No hardware comes with this product

Shop for Burgee Flags to Leave a Lasting Impression on Your Target Audience and Attain Your Marketing Goals

Your business needs advertising and branding to create awareness about your products and services. Apart from spreading the word, you also want your marketing initiatives to create a better recall value and recognition of your brand. Your marketing collaterals should be attractive, easy to install, and should grab the attention of your customers even from a distance. Custom burgee flags are an excellent marketing tool that enables you to advertise on boats, marinas or any nautical themed activities.

The burgee flags are made of superior-quality knitted polyester fabric with a thickness of 90 GSM. The flags can withstand harsh external conditions like strong winds. Moreover, they are long-lasting and can be reused multiple times.

They are ideal for both commercial and personal use to catch the attention of your customers and visitors. You can print them on one side or both sides to make your custom flags, as per your requirements. We use full color 1440 DPI, dye sublimation printing technique.

Single-sided flags will show the image on the backside as a mirrored image with 50%-60% visibility. Double-sided flags allow you to print two different images on the back and front. These flags also have a liner sewn between the two sides. The burgee flag printing features vibrant and brilliant hues that can be personalized according to your needs.

You get a variety of templates to choose your design from. However, you can upload your own graphic or design to create these personalized burgee flags. Whether you want to print a letter, word, or image, we will create the exact design on the flag. You can also hire a designer to create a professional flag for advertising your services or products.

These burgee flags are easy to wash and maintain. You can wash them in a washing machine with mild detergent or wash them by hand. When washing in a machine, run a mild cycle to ensure the fabric's longer shelf life.

These flags have an additional 3" white fabric on the selected side for pole pockets. Moreover, there is an extra 1" white fabric on the selected side for grommets. This thoughtful design makes it easier to install and remove burgee flags from poles. You can also get bulk discounts when you buy these flags in large quantities.

With our versatile sandwich-board signs, target your local customers on the go in a simple yet classic way. These sidewalk signs have an elegant white finish which catches your client’s eye from afar and ensures all letters and panels pop and shine.

The sidewalk signs come with a molded-in handle that makes them easy to lift and carry. We provide the signicade message board in a pre assembled condition so that you don’t have to worry about assembling it. Our signicades are available in 2 ft x 3 ft size.

Made of premium quality material, our white signicades are extremely lightweight. They weigh 21lbs and are perfect for outdoor use. They can also be ballasted with sand.

Our white signicade message board comes in 45"x25"x3" frame dimensions. Additionally, we also give our customers the option of adding frames along with their signicade message board. If you select this option, graphics will not be included with the same.

White Signicade Message Board Comes With a Letter Kit

Letter changeover is an easy, undemanding process - the letters can be attached to the message board by sliding in. The lettering kit consists of 272 letters, numbers, and symbols.

Bulk Quantity Discounts Available on Signicade Message Board

For all orders ranging from 2-100, we offer special discounts. The amount varies depending upon the quantity of your purchase. So, stop worrying about exceeding budgeted ad spend and order now.

Description:
Now you never have to worry about your establishment getting lost in the crowd. With our eye-catching Swinger sidewalk signs, arrest the attention of passersby and divert traffic to your business at a fraction of the cost of commercial advertising avenues. Our outdoor signs are built with a durable plastic construction, meant to withstand the roughest of weather, with built-in resistance to wind and rain. These sandwich board signs can also be filled with sand to improve their stability and resistance to strong winds, preventing them from being displaced or blown away. These swinger letter signs support panels on both sides of the sign, so that no visual space is left unused. The super-easy slide-in, slide-out, mechanism means displaying your messages and changing them is easier than ever. This sign can be used for a variety of purposes, such as:

  • Restaurant signs, for menus, seasonal specials, discounts, or other promotional or branding purposes
  • Advertising offers, promotional content, or use for decoration by establishments like cafes or salons
  • Personal use for decoration, or for advertising bake sales, garage sales, or parties
  • Use by events like carnivals or fairs for branding, promotional, or advertising purposes

Assembly is also fast and efficient - all you need to do is attach the frame to the legs and you're good to go! Order our Swinger Message Board A-frame signs now and watch your business stand out from the crowd!
Short_description:
Quick assembly, duration construction and more

  • Weather-resistant and rust-proof plastic construction that protects your sign against the elements
  • Can be ballast with sand to prevent wind damage
  • Letter kit features a full set of letters, numbers and symbols along with duplicates of each, so you never miss a letter!

Description:
Your search to find the best alternative to newspaper adverts and sticking flyers on walls or handouts in order to promote your brand stops here! Our Swinger Deluxe A-frame signs are the best passive generators of footfall into your establishment, thanks to the bright letters and the eye-catching frame. The Swinger Deluxe outdoor signs are built with a rust-proof, weather-resistant plastic construction that protects it against the elements and can resist wind displacement. These sidewalk signs also come with two complete sets of letter, numbers and symbols, so that you never run out of letters to express your brand's identity. Product AB Desc:
Product Specification
  • Graphic Material: Knitted Polyester Fabric
  • Graphic Weight: 90 GSM
  • Hardware Material: Plastic
  • Single-Sided Printing: Single-sided flags will show the image on the back side as a mirrored image with 50-60% visibility.
  • Double-Sided Printing: Double-sided flags can have 2 separate images or the same image. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.
Pole Diameter
  • Pole Diameter for Economy Flag:10 mm
  • Pole Diameter for Premium Flag:12 mm
  • Finishing: White pocket at left side to insert the stick
  • Total pole height for Economy Flag: 43.5cm +/- 5mm
  • Total pole height for Premium Flag: 50cm +/- 5mm

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

Buy Personalized Car Flags to Fulfill Your Promotional Needs

Product Overview

Eye-Catching Sky Tube Curved Triangle Hanging Banners for Events

Take your brand visibility to the next level with our skytube curved triangle hanging banners. These custom banners are designed to grab attention at trade shows, conventions and events. With a sleek, modern look and durable build, these banners help you stand out in any crowded space. Made for easy setup and reuse, they’re a premium yet affordable solution for businesses seeking high impact.

Sturdy, High-Quality Material Construction

Our triangle banners feature strong, durable 6 oz polyester fabric with a full-color, zippered tension print that resists fade over time. The robust build includes a collapsible aluminum frame, ensuring both lightweight portability and solid structure. This frame hangs from the ceiling using a variety of hardware - chain, spring, eye hook, large screw, hook loop lock, and screw tightener, all included in the package for a reliable, secure display. Each banner contains three graphic panels with a seamless design, creating an eye-catching curved triangle that grabs attention from every angle.

Customizable for Unique Brand Expression

Our custom hanging banners allow for endless personalization to reflect your brand’s identity. Choose from ready-made templates, or use our online tool to design your banner with your logo, tagline, and imagery for maximum impact. Each of the three panels can be customized with the same design, and you can even opt for double-sided printing. The unique curved triangle shape allows designs on the reverse side to be visible, amplifying your brand’s visibility. A complimentary nylon travel bag is included, making it easy to transport and reuse these affordable custom banners wherever needed.

Versatile, Portable and Budget-Friendly

With their easy portability and reusable structure, our banners are ideal for multiple events. Whether showcasing at trade shows, conventions, or outdoor exhibitions, these advertising banners are built for convenience. Order more than one, and you’ll receive a special bulk discount to make outfitting any large-scale event more affordable. Our commitment to quality and competitive pricing ensures you get the best value for your business.

Make a lasting impression with custom banners for business that make your brand stand out. Order today for a promotional display that combines durability, style, and affordability!

Description:
Our Triangle Sky Tube Hanging Banners Frame is Made from Durable Anodized Coated Aluminum

Want to promote your business with an out-of-the-box promotional tool? Check out our innovative and creative tapered triangle sky tube hanging banners. These customizable ceiling displays will hike your sales or increase your brand presence.

The triangle hanging banners frame is made of anodized coated aluminum. The high-quality aluminum used makes the frame extremely durable, sturdy and corrosion-resistant. It includes bungee poles, curved poles and inbuilt push lock pins. The pole diameter is 32mm and thickness is 1.4mm. The frame is lightweight and therefore easy to transport.

Our triangle hanging banners are available in the following sizes:-(W x H) 8ft x2ft, 8ft x 2.67ft, 8ft x 3ft, 8ft x 3.5ft, 10ft x 2ft,10ft x 2.67ft, 10ft x 3ft, 10ft x 3.5ft, 10ft x 4ft, 12ft x 2ft, 12ft x2.67ft, 12ft x 3ft, 12ft x 3.5ft, 12ft x 4ft and 15ft x 4ft. The frame is designed in a unique way such that it can be installed and folded quickly without much effort.

The hanging kit of our triangle banners (which comes with the hardware) includes hooks and slings. The length of the sling is 160 cm. These give the banner a firm support and makes the display hanging from the ceiling secure.

Customize the Graphics of Your Triangle Hanging Banner

Customize the graphics of your triangle hanging banners. Banner graphics are made from premium-quality polyester with a graphic weight of 230 GSM. Printing is done using sublimation dye. This is a thick, durable fabric and is also scratch free. You can get any attractive logo or message printed on one side or both sides of the banner.

We have also included a soft carry bag with our banner hangers. This will make moving it around convenient. The graphic fabric is easy to maintain. The fabric can be machine washed at regular temperature with a mild detergent or hand washed.

Get a Discount on Bulk Orders of our Banner Hangers

You can order as many banner hangers as you want and enjoy our discounts on bulk orders. The discount increases with the number of units ordered.

Description:
Dynamic Inflatable Tube Man: A Vibrant Advertising Solution

The Inflatable Tube Man is an effective and dynamic advertising tool, designed to capture attention in various settings such as businesses, storefronts, and events. This vibrant, air-inflatable dancer exhibits an animated presence, constantly moving with flapping arms and a waving gesture, making it hard to ignore.

Its functionality is powered by a blower at the base, which injects air to create the lively movements. The tube man is crafted from high-strength polyester with added tarpaulin, providing durability and flexibility, ensuring it's rip-proof and long-lasting.

The bottom material is made of sturdy 600D PVC/nylon, and it features dye-sublimation printing for a visually appealing design. This advertising inflatable is an ideal choice for businesses looking to enhance visibility and engage passersby in a fun, interactive way.

Customizable Outdoor Inflatable Tube Men: Solution for Effective Advertising and Easy Maintenance

BannerBuzz's Solid Color Inflatable Tube Men are customizable in size, blower diameter, and material quality, suitable for outdoor advertising.

They come with an option for weather-resistant material, enhancing their durability against various outdoor elements. Customers have the flexibility to choose from multiple heights (6ft, 10ft, 20ft) and blower diameters (9'', 12'', 18'') to suit their specific installation needs.

This personalization allows for a tailored advertising experience, ensuring that the tube men stand out and withstand environmental conditions effectively. The availability of a weather-resistant blower is a crucial attribute.

This feature guarantees that the blower, essential for maintaining the inflatable's upright and dynamic presence, possesses the robustness to endure diverse climatic conditions such as winds and rain.

To clean your inflatable, use cold water in a front-loading washing machine, as top-loading models might tangle it. Use a small amount of mild, non-bleach detergent to prevent discoloration.

Alternatively, hand washing with mild soap is also an option. After washing, avoid machine drying; instead, hang it out to dry.

Description:
PVC Foam Board Signs Professional ? Versatile ? Customizable

PVC foam board signs and posters give you maximum value for short-term indoor uses. The PVC in our foam board really stands for polyvinyl chloride, but it could mean professional, versatile, customizable.

That's because our custom foam board printing can be digitally printed in full color, giving you an inexpensive way to make your presentations shine. Foam core signs feature lightweight materials that won't curl up, so they can be displayed in dry erase board or chalkboard trays. They can even be propped against items on a conference room table or desk during a conversational delivery. Mount your PVC foam board signs on easels for a more formal presentation.

Versatility to go almost anywhere

One of the biggest advantages of custom foam board printing is that you can have the boards fill in wherever you need them. They are popular for use as visual aids in business meetings and sales pitches, as well as in church classes and school talks. Custom foam board signs work great for displays in theaters, libraries, restaurants, sidewalk sales, school activities, and nonprofit events.

Our PVC foam board signs are easy for you to customize. With our user-friendly online design tool, you can quickly customize foam boards with your text and graphics. If you need help, our professional designers are standing by to offer their custom foam board printing expertise at no extra charge.

Affordable enough to use just once

The reasonable prices of foam PVC sign boards makes them ideal for short-term displays. In fact, if you can find a lower published price, we will not only match it ... we'll give you 10 percent off.

What are the benefits of our custom foam board printing services? We'll deliver eye-catching graphics and text to reinforce your message, your audience will never be "bored."

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Product Overview

Discover the Versatility and Functionality of Our 6' x 6' Canopy for Business and Events

Whether you're setting up a business booth, hosting an outdoor event, or needing a reliable promotional space, our 6' x 6' canopy tent offers an attractive and user-friendly solution.  We also offer custom canopy tent 10x10 that are versatile, professional, and draws attention effortlessly. The frame is made from durable aluminum, designed for custom pop up tents.  Designed for both effectiveness and ease of installation, setting up these canopy tents for outside is as quick as it is eye-catching.

Superior Materials and Construction: Durable Fabrics for Long-lasting Use

Our custom canopy tent with logo features two fabric options to suit to your preferences. The standard option includes a 600 denier acrylic-coated polyester fabric with a substantial graphic weight of 8 oz, providing durability and vibrant display quality. For the environmentally conscious, our sustainable tent fabric is 100% PVC free, made from GRS-certified 600 denier acrylic-coated sustainable polyester fabric, also weighing 8 oz. This blend of premium materials and thoughtful design underscores our commitment to quality while ensuring our products remain affordable. The frame features a pop-up aluminum construction and telescopic legs that snap into place, offering 3 adjustable layers for height customization. This ensures your tent stands firm and stable in various outdoor conditions. The poles are 1.6" in diameter.

Extensive Customization Options: Design Your Perfect Canopy

Tailor your canopy tent to meet your unique needs, offering a range of customization options. Choose from various back, front, and side wall configurations, available in both single-sided and double-sided designs. Utilize our design tool, upload your artwork directly, or hire a designer for a truly custom creation. Our comprehensive service caters to all your creative requirements, making it easy to develop a tent that genuinely represents your brand and enhances your presence.

Optimizing Your Canopy with Essential Accessories and Simple Care

Enhance your custom pop up canopy experience with essential accessories like a convenient wheeled travel bag for effortless mobility. A topper attachment featuring a self-securing closure on the inside edge of the valance ensures easy assembly of additional accessories. Maintain your canopy's pristine condition with simple care instructions: wash with water, a soft sponge, and non-detergent soap, and make sure to dry it thoroughly, preferably in sunlight. We also offer bulk discounts and efficient shipping options to accommodate your business needs.

Ready to make a lasting impression? Choose our 6' x 6' canopy for your next outdoor event and enjoy a perfect blend of style, convenience, and quality.

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

Description:
Custom Awareness Garden Flags to Keep Your Customers, Employees, and Premises Safe

Whether you are hosting an outdoor party, conducting a yard sale, or operating your business outdoors, it is your responsibility to create awareness on burning issues. Here’s where Awareness Garden Flags can come in handy. They can create awareness on the best health and safety practices so that anyone who visits the premises stays safe.

These flags consist of two elements - an iron pole to hoist the flag and the flag fabric with the imprinted graphic.

You can customize the graphics by choosing from our wide variety of templates. Alternatively, you can directly upload your artwork, design using our nifty tool, or hire a professional to carry out the design.

Additionally, you can pick to print the graphics on one side of the flag or on either side. In the case of the former, the single-sided print will have 50-60% mirror-image visibility on the back. In contrast, the double-sided print will have two separate flags sewn together.

Awareness Flags for Durable Indoors and Outdoors Usage

Whether you install these awareness flags indoors or outdoors, they will continue to perform the same regardless. The flags retain their high visibility and optical clarity owing to the fact that they are digitally printed through the sublimation technique. It makes the colors stand out, which makes the graphic and the message crystal clear.

Additionally, the iron hardware is extremely robust and resistant to changing weather.

Garden Flags That Are Easy and Convenient to Install

These garden flags are easy and convenient to install. All you need to do is slip the horizontal arm of the flag holder into the sleeve of the flag or banner located at the top, and you are all set. Then, you can drive the pole into the moist ground simply by applying pressure on the top or striking it down with a hammer. Alternatively, you can also hang the flagpole on a wall or against a pillar if you wish to suspend the flags at a height or place them indoors. Either way, the installation does not require any professional intervention and can be done by any individual.

We even offer bulk order discounts, so you can save up on bulk purchases.

Description:
Our ‘Precaution Garden Flags’ are Made of Durable & Good Quality Flag Fabric

Spreading awareness regarding the safety measures to prevent the pandemic is critical and the need of the hour. Help spread the word and the necessary safeguards to be taken with our precaution garden flags. They can be placed at all places and are informative and highly effective.

Our garden flags are made with the best quality 90 GSM knitted flag fabric. This makes them durable and last longer. The flag dimensions are 12 inches x 18 inches and are noticeable even from a distance. These are outdoor flags and can withstand the weather conditions well.

Graphics for the flags can be customized. You can use our design tool with templates and create your own design or you can upload your designs and get the proofing done from us. We also have a hire a designer option, where you can take the help of our designers to create the best designs.

The hardware of the garden flag is a durable iron pole which is 52cm x10cmx10cm in dimensions. The pole is sturdy and size is just appropriate to be easily shoved into the ground for display. They can be exhibited at various places, commercial complexes, medical facilities, educational institutes, shopping complexes, and more.

Custom Garden Flags are Created Using Sublimation Printing

Our garden flags are printed using the sublimation printing technique. This is a highly efficient form of digital printing which brings out the graphics vividly and the signs are clearly readable, even from a distance.

Printing can be on a single side or on both the sides of the garden flags. The flags with printing on one side, exhibit a mirrored image on the back side with 50% to 60% visibility. The flags with both the sides printed can have the same image or two different ones. A liner is sewn between the two sides so that the images do not reflect on each other.

Get a Discount on Bulk Orders on our Precaution Garden Flags

You can order any number of garden flags and enjoy bulk order discounts. Check out the discount table for further details. Free super shipping is available on all orders above $99.

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Hanging Options

Metal Grommets

Made from heavy duty brass, these rustproof grommets are set in place onto a punched hole creating a secure and strong edge. Use them in conjunction with a rope, ties, bungee cords, or other tie-down options. You can choose the position of grommets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Pole Pockets

A pole pocket is a pole sleeve where a pole or a rod can slide into. It is created by folding and sealing approximately 3" extra material outside the actual flag size towards the back of the flag. You can choose the position of pole pockets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Hanging Options

Metal Grommets

Made from heavy duty brass, these rustproof grommets are set in place onto a punched hole creating a secure and strong edge. Use them in conjunction with a rope, ties, bungee cords, or other tie-down options. You can choose the position of grommets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Pole Pockets

A pole pocket is a pole sleeve where a pole or a rod can slide into. It is created by folding and sealing approximately 3" extra material outside the actual flag size towards the back of the flag. You can choose the position of pole pockets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Product AB Desc:
Product Specification
  • Graphic Material: Knitted Polyester Fabric
  • Graphic Weight: 90 GSM
  • Printing: 1440 DPI, Full Color, Dye Sublimation Printing
  • Single Sided Printing: Single sided flags will show the image on the back side as a mirrored image with 50-60% visibility.
  • Double Sided Printing: Double sided flags can have 2 separate images or the same image. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides
  • Finishing: Additional 3" white fabric on selected side for pole pocket. Grommet will be placed in the given size.
  • Finish size may have +/-1" variation.

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Hanging Options

Metal Grommets

Made from heavy duty brass, these rustproof grommets are set in place onto a punched hole creating a secure and strong edge. Use them in conjunction with a rope, ties, bungee cords, or other tie-down options. You can choose the position of grommets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Pole Pockets

A pole pocket is a pole sleeve where a pole or a rod can slide into. It is created by folding and sealing approximately 3" extra material outside the actual flag size towards the back of the flag. You can choose the position of pole pockets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Graphic Care Instructions
  • Polyester, nylon or other synthetic fabrics are normally safe to wash in a machine.
  • Set the washing machine on the gentle cycle with warm water.
  • Add mild liquid laundry detergent to the wash water.
  • You can also hand wash the flag with a mild liquid detergent made for delicate items. Frequent use of washing machine for cleaning flag may harm knitting of the fabric.

NOTE:

We offer only graphic for the flag. No hardware comes with this product

Buy Personalized Flags to Advertise Your Business Effectively

Attract the attention of your customers as you promote and advertise your business or event. Flags offer an easy way to communicate with others, as they are eye-catching. Use our personalized flags to get the attention of customers and drive more business to your company.

We make our promotional flags out of premium fabric that offers durability, helping you save on the costs of replacements and repairs. The material is resistant to tearing and is safe for use in any environment. The flags are suitable for outdoor use as they can withstand tough weather conditions.

Custom options are available on these fabric flags. You can choose 1- or 2-sided personalized flag printing. Single sided flags will show the image on the back side as a mirrored image with 50-60% visibility. Double sided flags can have the same image on both sides or 2 separate images. We provide a convenient design tool as well as the option to upload your own custom artwork, so you can create something unique for your brand.

These personalized flags feature lightweight materials that make them easy to carry around. Putting them in storage takes very little effort, reducing the manpower needed. You can also relocate the portable advertisements to reach a wider audience as needed.

You can keep these promotional flags clean by washing them in a washing machine on a gentle cycle or simply handwashing. They only require mild detergent and warm water, making them easy to maintain.

Use the provided space to add your own optional instructions as you see fit. Write down any specific details that you want us to change when producing your fabric flags. This makes it easy to ensure your order looks just right for your business.

Select from multiple delivery options and receive your advertising flags in a timely manner. We even offer doorstep delivery for greater convenience. Pick an option that is most suitable for your company's budget and schedule.

Shop online for Personalized Flags for your business at BannerBuzz.

Printing Options

Single Sided Printing

The default single sided printing option has printing on one side of the flag with its mirror image on the back side with 50-60% visibility.

Double Sided Printing

Design your graphics with two-sided printing for multi-directional marketing opportunities. You can get the same or different image printed on both sides. These flags have a liner sewn in between the two sides.

Hanging Options

Metal Grommets

Made from heavy duty brass, these rustproof grommets are set in place onto a punched hole creating a secure and strong edge. Use them in conjunction with a rope, ties, bungee cords, or other tie-down options. You can choose the position of grommets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Pole Pockets

A pole pocket is a pole sleeve where a pole or a rod can slide into. It is created by folding and sealing approximately 3" extra material outside the actual flag size towards the back of the flag. You can choose the position of pole pockets at the top or the left side of the flag as per your requirements.

Shop for Pride Flags to Show Pride, Love, & Support to the LGBTQ Community

The month of June every year marks the beginning of Global pride month. People across the globe come together to celebrate the lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender communities in several ways. People show recognition & support for the LGBT community by holding and raising pride flags & banners at rallies & parades. Offering custom-printed flags & banners for pride celebrations is our way of showing support & inclusiveness. Our custom pride flags come in predefined & custom sizes to meet your requirements.

The flags are made using 90 GSM knitted polyester fabric for resilience. The pride flag printing is done using 1440 DPI, dye sublimation printing technique in full color. The myriad color combination reproduced using this technique ensures the colors are fade-resistant and leave a lasting impression on onlookers.

Our beautifully printed pride flags are a fantastic way to support and promote the gay, lesbian, and transgender community at any indoor or outdoor activity. You can bring our durable & versatile flag banners to use by hanging, hand-holding, or installing them on poles or cars as per your advertising needs. You can select a suitable size from our predefined or custom size options to suit your advertising & installation needs well.

Our rainbow pride banners are designed to show support and create awareness of the LGBTQ community. You can encourage inclusiveness and equality by advertising these flags outside your business space or workplace. You can even add a branding touchpoint to your pride flags with our custom design feature by uploading your artwork or using our easy design tool. We also offer the option to hire a designer for intricate design purposes.

To help you promote what you believe in, we leave it to you to add the right messaging to your rainbow pride flag. Get creative and add a voice to your LGBTQ flag via a custom-printed message, slogan, or symbol.

We offer both single-sided & double-sided printing choices to accommodate your pride flag promotion needs. The single-sided flag is printed on one side, with 50%-60% visibility of the mirrored image on the backside. Even though the design is somewhat visible on the other side, you should only use a one-sided flag for one-way advertising.

The essential benefit of a double-sided flag is having the same or separate images printed on each side of the flag. These flags have a liner sewn between the two sides so that the reflection of one print does not overlap with the print on the other side. Our 2-sided pride flag provides maximum coverage as it communicates the message clearly from both sides and does not limit your ability to advertise.

Our pride flags come with two different finishing options. Both our quality finishing options add a clean & professional look to the flag banner. One of the options is our heavy-duty metal grommets which are perfect for a variety of installation needs. Heavy-duty brass grommets are placed onto punched holes, creating a secure & strong edge across the top or left side of the flag based on your preferred selection.

The other finishing option is the pole pocket, preferably used for installing the flag graphic over a pole or cable. To create the pole pocket (top or left), we fold and seal the flag material towards the back. The strong pocket sleeve allows the pole or rod to slide into it easily. Buy these pride flags to show your support and affection for the LGBTQ community.

Printing 1440 DPI, Full Color, Dye-Sublimation Printing
Hardware Included Poles
Hardware Material Aluminum
Frame Construction Aluminum tubing with numbered push-pin poles
Carry Bag Material Nylon

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Hardware Material Aluminum
Graphic Size Variance Upto 5': +/- 0.5"

Graphic Care Instructions

Washing Options

  • Regularly machine wash at a normal temperature using mild detergent, or hand wash as needed

Drying Options

  • Dry flat for best results
  • Drip or line dry
  • Tumble dry at gentlest setting

Removing Wrinkles

  • If fully dry, iron at high temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • If moist, iron at moderate temperature using plain paper in between the fabric and the iron plate
  • Do not iron when soaked

Note: If your fabric product includes any rubber or velcro attachments, hand wash it carefully, ensuring these components stay dry

Product AB Desc:
Product Specification
  • Material: 100% polyester block-out fabric with acrylic coating
  • Print Side: One side only
  • Print Type: Latex
  • Fabric Roll Direction: From back of the roll
  • Follow our Measuring Guide for perfect fit.
  • Note: Our roller shades are intentionally made 1.5" shorter than the ordered width to account for the mounting brackets and mechanism.

Buy Custom Roller Blackout Shades for Ultimate Light Control and Privacy

BannerBuzz introduces custom graphic roller shades - blackout that help our customers save money while also making their homes and business look great. They are the perfect choice for partially or completely darkening the room. Printed window shades are one of the few value-for-money choices that business owners love to invest in as no longer have to struggle with whether they want to purchase other signs, marketing posters, or window stickers. They can save money, protect their walls and merchandise from sun bleaching, as well as take advantage of energy efficiency.

Our blackout roller shades are made from 100% polyester black-out fabric with acrylic coating. The material is durable, strong, and low-cost. Polyester fabrics are typically the preferred option for blackout protection because of their unique ability to block light. This fabric is also easy-to-clean and maintains for years.

Be it for working professionals or students, everyone needs a silent and pleasant atmosphere to concentrate better on their work. Custom graphic blackout roller shades are one such promising option for improving the quality of work, health, and most-importantly sound sleep during daytime.

Mount Type

Inside Mount

Upon choosing an inside mount, the blinds fit inside the window frame. It gives the window a minimalist, clean and finished look. 

Outside Mount

An outside mount is when blinds are installed on the wall above the window or directly on the window trim. This mount style is ideal for windows where there’s not enough window depth to mount inside, or when you want more coverage to darken a room.

Lift Options

White Nylon Bead Chain

The white nylon bead chains feature beaded pulls that raise or lower the shade when pulled on the front or back. It can be mounted on the left or right side of the shade. Choose the shade side that is most convenient to pull.  

White Crank

White crank features geared mechanism for easy operation. Simply, insert it into the roller blinds to lift or close. It can be completely removed when not in use which makes blinds look tidier and nicer.

Lift Side

Left side

If the placement of any object or furniture in a tight corner blocks the roller shade, the chain pull should be moved to the opposite side. Select the left-side option to control the lift on the left side of the shade. 

Right side

 If the placement of any object or furniture in a tight corner blocks the roller shade, the chain pull should be moved to the opposite side. Select the right-side option to control the lift on the right side of the shade.

Custom Blackout Roller Shades for Improved Health and Brand Exposure

Personalization adds charm to your exterior custom blackout roller shades. You have the option to upload your own artwork or use an online design tool to create impressive logos or any design that would attract customers from afar and make your brand more visible. Please be aware the artwork can be printed on single-side only.

Roller shades with creative and thematic motifs attract customers and guests from afar and make them appreciate your furnishings. Multiple window shades personalized according to a specific theme or color of choice give a unique ambience to your house and stores. We use the latex printing technique to print the graphics onto the shades. In all environments and on all surfaces, latex printing has advanced print technology to produce bold, colorful print graphics. Even after several washes, you can count on the print to stay spotless.

Custom Graphic Roller Shades come with Easy-to-Use Accessories

Our custom roller shades blackout blinds can be easily mounted on the wall easily. We provide the option to place the lifting nylon bead chains either on the left or right, wherein the fabric would be rolled from the back. A crank is available as an additional accessory to facilitate the hassle-free operation of shades.

Also, blackout shades offer an ultimate level of light control thereby creating the ideal setup for corporate presentations and, e-teaching where smart boards and projectors are frequently used. Most importantly, during summers, shades reflect away the sun’s light and help keep the room a bit cooler.

Shop online for custom graphic roller shades today!

Print Type Latex
Print Side One side only
Fabric Roll Direction From back of the roll

Uplift your interiors with custom blackout roller shades that blend style with practical benefits. These shades are expertly designed to block light, enhancing privacy and creating a darker ambiance. The robust material resists wear, guaranteeing durability for years of consistent use. A leeway of 1.5" is included for mounting mechanisms.
